newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan to manage economy to ensure recovery -- MOF.
newsitem.headline: Japan to manage economy to ensure recovery -- MOF.

text.p: The Japanese government will manage its economic policies so as to ensure the sustainability of the country's economic recovery, Finance Minister Hiroshi Mitsuzuka said on Thursday.
In a speech to trust bank executives, Mitsuzuka said the Japanese economy is recovering. "The pace of recovery is slow, but private demand is firming up," he said.
"The government will continue to manage its economic policies appropriately to ensure the sustainability of the recovery, and stable medium- and long-term growth," he said.
Mitsuzuka added that Japan's employment situation was still bad, but there were signs of improvement.
